declarations.bibleVerseText: But remember the Lord your God, for it is he who gives you the ability to produce wealth.

declarations.text: The Lord blesses me and makes me rich without sorrow.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blessing of the Lord brings wealth, without painful toil for it.

declarations.text: I prosper in all things and walk in divine health.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Beloved, I pray that you may prosper in all things and be in health, just as your soul prospers.

declarations.text: I seek God first, and all things are added to me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.

declarations.text: I am blessed in the city and blessed in the field.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will be blessed in the city and blessed in the country.

declarations.text: My barns are filled with plenty and my vats overflow.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then your barns will be filled to overflowing, and your vats will brim over with new wine.

declarations.text: I am the head and not the tail; I will lend and not borrow.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will make you the head, not the tail. You will lend to many nations but will borrow from none.

declarations.text: Wealth and riches are in my house, for I fear the Lord.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Wealth and riches are in their houses, and their righteousness endures forever.

declarations.text: I give and it is given back to me, pressed down and running over.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over, will be poured into your lap.

declarations.text: I honor the Lord with my wealth and He blesses my increase.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Honor the Lord with your wealth, with the firstfruits of all your crops.

declarations.text: The Lord takes pleasure in my prosperity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let them shout for joy and be glad, who favor my righteous cause; and let them say continually, 'Let the Lord be magnified, who has pleasure in the prosperity of His servant.'

declarations.text: God supplies all my needs according to His riches.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And my God will meet all your needs according to the riches of his glory in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I sow generously and reap abundantly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whoever sows sparingly will also reap sparingly, and whoever sows generously will also reap generously.

declarations.text: I meditate on God’s Word and prosper in all I do.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But whose delight is in the law of the Lord... whatever they do prospers.

declarations.text: God makes my way prosperous and gives me success.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then you will be prosperous and successful.

declarations.text: I am fruitful and multiply in every area of my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be fruitful and increase in number; fill the earth and subdue it.

declarations.text: I am like a tree planted by streams of water, bearing fruit in every season.
declarations.bibleVerseText: That person is like a tree planted by streams of water, which yields its fruit in season.

declarations.text: God opens the floodgates of heaven and pours out blessings upon me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: See if I will not throw open the floodgates of heaven and pour out so much blessing that there will not be room enough to store it.

declarations.text: I am diligent, and my hands bring abundance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Diligent hands will rule, but laziness ends in forced labor.

declarations.text: The Lord prospers me so I can be a blessing to others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And I will bless you, and make your name great, so that you will be a blessing.

declarations.text: I have abundance in every good work through God’s grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

declarations.text: I prosper because I am obedient to God’s Word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If you fully obey the Lord your God... all these blessings will come on you and accompany you if you obey the Lord your God.

declarations.text: I am faithful with little, and God entrusts me with much.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You have been faithful with a few things; I will put you in charge of many things.

declarations.text: You are blessed abundantly; I provide for every need you have.
I am your shepherd; you will lack nothing in any situation.
You are my beloved, and I have prepared abundance for you.
I am your source; trust me for prosperity in all you do.
You are chosen to thrive; my blessings overflow in your life.
I have opened doors of provision for you that no one can close.
You are surrounded by my favor; abundance is always within reach.
I am your provider; trust me, and you will never lack.
You are my child; my goodness fills your life with wealth and joy.
I delight in your prosperity; everything you do will succeed in me.
You are my vessel; I pour out blessings for you to share with others.
I give you strength to create wealth; your work is blessed by me.
You are never forgotten; my abundant grace provides for you daily.
I am leading you to green pastures; my abundance is always yours.
You are blessed to be a blessing; my riches flow through you.
I am your anchor in every season; my abundance never runs out.
You are my heir; my kingdom’s abundance belongs to you forever.
I am giving you wisdom to manage my blessings with grace and purpose.
You are planted by streams of living water; your life overflows with plenty.
I am your unshakable foundation; prosperity follows your faith in me.
You are loved; my abundance flows freely into your life daily.
I supply all your needs according to my riches in glory.
You are my delight; I rejoice in pouring blessings into your life.
I am your constant provider; my storehouses are overflowing for you.
You are favored by me; my abundance will chase after you.
I work hard and receive the rewards of my efforts.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Work brings profit, but mere talk leads to poverty!

declarations.text: I honor the Lord with my wealth and He blesses me abundantly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Honor the Lord with your wealth, with the firstfruits of all your crops; then your barns will be filled to overflowing, and your vats will brim over with new wine.

declarations.text: I seek wisdom, and with it comes wealth and honor.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Wisdom offers you long life in her right hand, and riches and honor in her left.

declarations.text: I am abundantly blessed with riches and success.
I am worthy of abundance and prosperity.
I am bold, fearless, and destined to thrive and prosper.
I am destined for abundance in every aspect of my life.
I'm like a money magnet, attracting wealth wherever I go!
I'm fighting for my dreams and making them real!
I find new ways to make money and be successful.
I'm not afraid of anything and I can do whatever it takes!
I am able to achieve all my God-given dreams.
I am gifted and anointed.
I am created to live abundantly and prosperous.
This is the day of breakthrough.
I am thriving.
The time of increase is now.
Prosperity is apart of my new identity.
God has given me the power and ability to get and stay wealthy.
I refuse to be poor.
Money comes to me easily.
I am wise with my time and resources.
I am very rich and wealthy.
I prosper in everything I do.
I have no lack in my life.
God delights in my prosperity.
I am blessed, prosperous and favored by God.
In Jesus' name, I am blessed with abundance, my cup overflows with His provision.
In Jesus' name, I attract wealth and success, for He has plans to prosper me.
In Jesus' name, I thrive in abundance.
In Jesus' name, I am a magnet for divine blessings, drawing wealth from unexpected sources.
In Jesus' name, I walk in financial freedom, debts canceled by His grace.
In Jesus' name, I sow generously and reap bountifully, my investments multiplied.
In Jesus' name, my work is rewarded with prosperity, my efforts crowned with success.
In Jesus' name, I am surrounded by favor, doors of opportunity swinging wide open.
In Jesus' name, I am empowered to build wealth, His spirit leading me to prosperity.
In Jesus' name, I live in the overflow, sharing generously from my abundance.
In Jesus' name, I claim victory over lack, living in the fullness of God's provision.
In Jesus' name, my finances are secure, protected by His promises of provision.
In Jesus' name, I am aligned with the rhythm of abundance, prosperity flowing in my life.
In Jesus' name, I am a testimony of His generosity, my life a reflection of His wealth.
In Jesus' name, I am rich in every way, my spirit enriched and my bank accounts full.
In Jesus' name, my future is filled with abundance.
In Jesus' name, I am anointed for prosperity.
In Jesus' name, wealth and honor accompany me, I live in the house of the Lord.
In Jesus' name, I embrace the kingdom's economy, where abundance is my birthright.
In Jesus' name, I claim the blessings of Abraham, inheriting the promise of prosperity through faith.
In Jesus' name, I follow the wisdom of Proverbs, attracting wealth through diligence and integrity.
In Jesus' name, I am like Joseph, prospering in all I do, even in foreign lands.
In Jesus' name, I am blessed like Solomon, with wisdom that brings wealth and honor.
In Jesus' name, I experience the multiplication of the loaves and fishes, witnessing abundance in scarcity.
And it is a good thing to receive wealth from God and the good health to enjoy it. To enjoy your work and accept your lot in life—this is indeed a gift from God.
He who walks with wise men will be wise, but the one who walks with fools will be destroyed.
I seek first the kingdom of God and his righteousness, and all these things will be added to me.
Delight yourself in the LORD, and he will give you the desires of your heart.
True humility and fear of the LORD lead to riches, honor, and long life.
Thank you Jesus for opening the floodgates of heaven to pour out Your blessings upon me.
Thank you Jesus for equipping me with the strength and wisdom to generate wealth.
Thank you Jesus for the abundant life You promised, filled with Your richness.
Thank you Jesus for guiding my steps towards prosperity in alignment with Your will.
Thank you Jesus for teaching me to be a steward of the riches You entrust to me.
Thank you Jesus for the legacy of wealth I can build for my family.
Thank you Jesus for the peace that comes with knowing my wealth is secure in You.
Thank you Jesus for the prosperity that follows obedience to Your commands.
Thank you Jesus for the wisdom to accumulate and manage wealth without losing my soul.
Thank you Jesus for the promise of prosperity when I delight myself in You.
Thank you Jesus for the richness of Your kingdom that I inherit as Your child.
Thank you Jesus for the honor of giving generously, mirroring Your giving heart.
Thank you Jesus for the security that comes from wealth built on Your foundation.
Thank you Jesus for the fruitful harvest that rewards my hard work and faith in You.
Thank you Jesus for the victories in financial battles, won through Your power and guidance.
Thank you Jesus for the grace that multiplies my resources, exceeding my expectations.
Thank you Jesus for the courage to dream big and pursue wealth with integrity.
Thank you Jesus for the privilege of living in abundance, reflecting Your kingdom on earth.
Thank you Jesus for setting me on a path of prosperity, marked by Your blessings and favor.
I have come that you may have life, and have it to the full.
Trust in my abundance, I provide more than you can ask or imagine.
I delight in your prosperity and well-being, walk in my ways.
I give you the power to create wealth, to establish my covenant.
Your faithfulness is rewarded in my kingdom, expect my blessings.
Give, and it will be given to you, a good measure, pressed down, shaken together, running over.
I am your provider, look to me for your needs.
God's blessings bring abundance into my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blessing of the Lord makes a person rich, and he adds no sorrow with it.

declarations.text: I trust in God's endless supply for my every need.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And my God will meet all your needs according to the riches of his glory in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I am growing in prosperity through God's grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

declarations.text: I am surrounded by God's favor and abundance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely, Lord, you bless the righteous; you surround them with your favor as with a shield.

declarations.text: God's abundance flows into every area of my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will open the heavens, the storehouse of his bounty, to send rain on your land in season and to bless all the work of your hands.

declarations.text: I honor God with my wealth and receive His blessings.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Honor the Lord with your wealth, with the firstfruits of all your crops; then your barns will be filled to overflowing, and your vats will brim over with new wine.

declarations.text: God provides me with wisdom to create and sustain wealth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: By wisdom a house is built, and through understanding it is established; through knowledge its rooms are filled with rare and beautiful treasures.

declarations.text: I trust God's plan for my prosperity and well-being.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.

declarations.text: God blesses me with an abundant life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I came that they may have life and have it abundantly.

declarations.text: I receive God's peace and prosperity in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord gives his people strength. The Lord blesses them with peace.

declarations.text: I am grateful for the wealth that God provides.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will be enriched in every way so that you can be generous on every occasion, and through us your generosity will result in thanksgiving to God.

declarations.text: I am a channel for God's prosperity to flow.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over, will be poured into your lap. For with the measure you use, it will be measured to you.

declarations.text: God empowers me to succeed and prosper.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord your God will make you most prosperous in all the work of your hands and in the fruit of your womb, the young of your livestock and the crops of your land.

declarations.text: God's grace abounds, bringing me prosperity in all things.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God is able to make all grace abound to you, so that always having all sufficiency in everything, you may have an abundance for every good deed.

declarations.text: I live in God's abundance and receive His bountiful blessings.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The generous will themselves be blessed, for they share their food with the poor.

declarations.text: God desires for me to live in abundance and fullness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy; I have come that they may have life, and have it to the full.

declarations.text: God's plans for me include prosperity and hope.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.

declarations.text: The Lord blesses me and gives me an abundant life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blessing of the Lord makes a person rich, and he adds no sorrow with it.

declarations.text: God provides for all my needs and more.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And my God will meet all your needs according to the riches of his glory in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: God's abundance is available to me every day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

declarations.text: God delights in my prosperity and success.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Take delight in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart.

declarations.text: God's favor brings me prosperity and joy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely, Lord, you bless the righteous; you surround them with your favor as with a shield.

declarations.text: God grants me the power to prosper and thrive.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But remember the Lord your God, for it is he who gives you the ability to produce wealth, and so confirms his covenant, which he swore to your ancestors, as it is today.

declarations.text: God's grace overflows in my life, bringing abundance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God is able to make all grace abound to you, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

declarations.text: God opens doors to prosperity and success for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will open the heavens, the storehouse of his bounty, to send rain on your land in season and to bless all the work of your hands.

declarations.text: I am planted in God's abundance and flourish.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The righteous will flourish like a palm tree, they will grow like a cedar of Lebanon; planted in the house of the Lord, they will flourish in the courts of our God.

declarations.text: God's prosperity flows freely into my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over, will be poured into your lap. For with the measure you use, it will be measured to you.

declarations.text: God desires to fill my life with good things.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You open your hand and satisfy the desires of every living thing.

declarations.text: God's abundance is my inheritance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will be enriched in every way so that you can be generous on every occasion, and through us your generosity will result in thanksgiving to God.

declarations.text: God's love for me brings prosperity and well-being.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Beloved, I pray that you may prosper in all things and be in health, just as your soul prospers.

declarations.text: I command abundance to flow into my life by the power of God's Word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blessing of the Lord makes a person rich, and he adds no sorrow with it.

declarations.text: I declare that prosperity is mine through Christ Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And my God will meet all your needs according to the riches of his glory in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I speak abundance into every area of my life by faith.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

declarations.text: I command the doors of prosperity to open for me now.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will open the heavens, the storehouse of his bounty, to send rain on your land in season and to bless all the work of your hands.

declarations.text: I declare God's abundance is mine today and always.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my shepherd; I have all that I need.

declarations.text: I speak blessings and wealth into my life with confidence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Death and life are in the power of the tongue, and those who love it will eat its fruits.

declarations.text: I command God's favor to bring me prosperity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely, Lord, you bless the righteous; you surround them with your favor as with a shield.

declarations.text: I declare that the riches of God's kingdom are mine.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Seek the Kingdom of God above all else, and he will give you everything you need.

declarations.text: I command financial breakthroughs to manifest in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over, will be poured into your lap.

declarations.text: I speak abundance and success into existence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will be enriched in every way so that you can be generous on every occasion, and through us your generosity will result in thanksgiving to God.

declarations.text: I declare that wealth flows into my life effortlessly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The wealth of the rich is their fortified city; they imagine it a wall too high to scale.

declarations.text: I command all forms of prosperity to come to me now.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And whatever you ask in prayer, you will receive, if you have faith.

declarations.text: I speak God's favor and abundance over my finances.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God is able to make all grace abound to you, so that having all sufficiency in all things at all times, you may abound in every good work.

declarations.text: I declare God's provision overflows in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: My cup overflows with blessings.

declarations.text: I command prosperity to take root in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But they delight in the law of the Lord, meditating on it day and night. They are like trees planted along the riverbank, bearing fruit each season. Their leaves never wither, and they prosper in all they do.

declarations.text: I work hard and receive the rewards of my efforts.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Work brings profit, but mere talk leads to poverty!

declarations.text: I honor the Lord with my wealth and He blesses me abundantly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Honor the Lord with your wealth, with the firstfruits of all your crops; then your barns will be filled to overflowing, and your vats will brim over with new wine.

declarations.text: I am diligent in my work, and I prosper because of it.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Lazy people want much but get little, but those who work hard will prosper.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord, and He makes me flourish like a tree by the river.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But blessed are those who trust in the Lord and have made the Lord their hope and confidence. They are like trees planted along a riverbank, with roots that reach deep into the water.

declarations.text: God blesses the work of my hands and increases my wealth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blessing of the Lord brings wealth, without painful toil for it.

declarations.text: I give generously and receive abundantly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give, and you will receive. Your gift will return to you in full—pressed down, shaken together to make room for more, running over, and poured into your lap.

declarations.text: I reap generously because I sow generously.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Remember this: Whoever sows sparingly will also reap sparingly, and whoever sows generously will also reap generously.

declarations.text: I am faithful with little, and God blesses me with much.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If you are faithful in little things, you will be faithful in large ones.

declarations.text: I am rich in every way and generous on every occasion.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will be enriched in every way so that you can be generous on every occasion.

declarations.text: I seek the kingdom of God first, and everything else is added to me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.

declarations.text: I obey God's word, and He prospers me in all I do.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Study this Book of Instruction continually. Meditate on it day and night so you will be sure to obey everything written in it. Only then will you prosper and succeed in all you do.

declarations.text: God is my shepherd, I lack nothing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my shepherd; I have all that I need.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord and He fills my life with abundance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The righteous will flourish like a palm tree, they will grow like a cedar of Lebanon.

declarations.text: God gives me the power to create wealth and establish His covenant.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But remember the Lord your God, for it is he who gives you the ability to produce wealth.

declarations.text: I am blessed and fruitful in everything I do.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will be blessed when you come in and blessed when you go out.

declarations.text: I am like a tree planted by streams of water, bearing fruit in season.
declarations.bibleVerseText: That person is like a tree planted by streams of water, which yields its fruit in season and whose leaf does not wither—whatever they do prospers.

declarations.text: I bring my tithes to God, and He opens the windows of heaven for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Bring all the tithes into the storehouse, so there will be enough food in my Temple. If you do, says the Lord of Heaven’s Armies, I will open the windows of heaven for you. I will pour out a blessing so great you won’t have enough room to take it in!

declarations.text: The Lord makes me rich and He is my source of happiness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blessing of the Lord makes a person rich, and he adds no sorrow with it.

declarations.text: I delight in God's Word, and He gives me the desires of my heart.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Take delight in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart.

declarations.text: I am generous, and I am blessed with even more.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The generous will prosper; those who refresh others will themselves be refreshed.

declarations.text: I trust in God, and He makes me successful.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Commit your actions to the Lord, and your plans will succeed.

declarations.text: Only ask, and I will give you the nations as your inheritance, the whole earth as your possession.
I lay down and slept, yet I woke up in safety, the Lord was watching over me.
I am not afraid of ten thousand enemies who surround me on every side.
Victory comes from you Lord. May you bless your people.
The Lord will answer when I call to him.
Don’t sin by letting anger control you. Think about it overnight and remain silent.
In peace I will lie down and sleep, for you alone Lord, will keep me safe.
May all my enemies be disgraced and terrified.
I praise the Lord, for He is good and His love endures forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give thanks to the Lord, for he is good; his love endures forever.

declarations.text: I will bless the Lord at all times; His praise is always on my lips.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will bless the Lord at all times; his praise shall continually be in my mouth.

declarations.text: God is faithful to all His promises, and I praise Him for His truth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the word of the Lord is right and true; he is faithful in all he does.

declarations.text: I give thanks to the Lord, for His mercies are new every morning.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases; his mercies never come to an end; they are new every morning; great is your faithfulness.

declarations.text: I sing for joy because the Lord has done great things for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord has done great things for us, and we are filled with joy.

declarations.text: I declare that God is my refuge and my fortress, and I trust in Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He is my refuge and my fortress, my God, in whom I trust.

declarations.text: I will exalt the Lord, for He has lifted me up.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will exalt you, Lord, for you lifted me out of the depths.

declarations.text: I praise God, for He is my strength and my salvation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my strength and my song; he has become my salvation.

declarations.text: I rejoice in the Lord always, for He is my joy and my song.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Rejoice in the Lord always. I will say it again: Rejoice!

declarations.text: God is my rock and my redeemer, and I will praise Him forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord lives! Praise be to my Rock! Exalted be God my Savior!

declarations.text: I give thanks in all circumstances, for God is always good.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give thanks in all circumstances; for this is God’s will for you in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I worship the Lord in the beauty of holiness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Worship the Lord in the splendor of his holiness; tremble before him, all the earth.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s faithfulness, and He will never fail me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Know therefore that the Lord your God is God, the faithful God who keeps covenant and steadfast love with those who love him.

declarations.text: The Lord is my shepherd, and I lack nothing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing.

declarations.text: I will praise the Lord among the nations and sing of His greatness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will praise you, Lord, among the nations; I will sing of you among the peoples.

declarations.text: The Lord is good, and His faithfulness continues through all generations.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lord is good and his love endures forever; his faithfulness continues through all generations.

declarations.text: I praise God for His wonderful deeds and mighty works.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will give thanks to you, Lord, with all my heart; I will tell of all your wonderful deeds.

declarations.text: I glorify God because His grace is sufficient for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But he said to me, 'My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.'

declarations.text: I bless the Lord with all my soul and remember His benefits.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Bless the Lord, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits.

declarations.text: I will lift up my hands and praise the Lord, for He is worthy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Lift up your hands in the sanctuary and bless the Lord.

declarations.text: God is my rock, my fortress, and my deliverer, and I trust in Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer; my God is my rock, in whom I take refuge.

declarations.text: I proclaim the greatness of the Lord, for He has done mighty things.
declarations.bibleVerseText: With my mouth I will make your faithfulness known through all generations.

declarations.text: I will declare God’s faithfulness in the morning and His love at night.
declarations.bibleVerseText: It is good to praise the Lord and make music to your name, O Most High, proclaiming your love in the morning and your faithfulness at night.

declarations.text: The Lord is my light and my salvation; I will not fear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my light and my salvation—whom shall I fear?

declarations.text: I will thank the Lord because he is just; I will sing praise to the name of the Lord Most High.
O Lord, our Lord, your majestic name fills the earth!
I will praise you, Lord, with all my heart; I will tell of all the marvelous things you have done.
The Lord is king forever and ever!
I will sing to the Lord because he is good to me.
The LORD lives! Praise to my Rock! May the God of my salvation be exalted!
I am a new creation in Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come.

declarations.text: I am a child of God, loved and chosen by Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: See what great love the Father has lavished on us, that we should be called children of God!

declarations.text: I am God’s masterpiece, created for good works.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For we are God’s handiwork, created in Christ Jesus to do good works, which God prepared in advance for us to do.

declarations.text: I am redeemed and forgiven through Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In him we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, in accordance with the riches of God’s grace.

declarations.text: I am seated with Christ in heavenly places.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God raised us up with Christ and seated us with him in the heavenly realms in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I am the righteousness of God in Christ Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God made him who had no sin to be sin for us, so that in him we might become the righteousness of God.

declarations.text: I am a chosen and royal priesthood, set apart for God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But you are a chosen people, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, God’s special possession.

declarations.text: I am more than a conqueror through Christ who loves me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: No, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us.

declarations.text: I am an heir of God and co-heir with Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now if we are children, then we are heirs—heirs of God and co-heirs with Christ.

declarations.text: I am the light of the world, shining for Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are the light of the world. A town built on a hill cannot be hidden.

declarations.text: I am set free in Christ, and I walk in freedom.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So if the Son sets you free, you will be free indeed.

declarations.text: I am fearfully and wonderfully made by God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I praise you because I am fearfully and wonderfully made; your works are wonderful.

declarations.text: I am an ambassador of Christ, representing His kingdom.
declarations.bibleVerseText: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us.

declarations.text: I am blessed with every spiritual blessing in Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us in the heavenly realms with every spiritual blessing in Christ.

declarations.text: I am the salt of the earth, bringing flavor and preservation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are the salt of the earth. But if the salt loses its saltiness, how can it be made salty again?

declarations.text: I am filled with the Spirit and empowered by God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But you will receive power when the Holy Spirit comes on you; and you will be my witnesses.

declarations.text: I am a temple of the Holy Spirit, and God dwells in me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do you not know that your bodies are temples of the Holy Spirit, who is in you, whom you have received from God?

declarations.text: I am strong in the Lord and in His mighty power.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be strong in the Lord and in his mighty power.

declarations.text: I am victorious in Christ and walk in His triumph.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But thanks be to God! He gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: I am clothed in Christ and walk in newness of life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For all of you who were baptized into Christ have clothed yourselves with Christ.

declarations.text: I am God’s workmanship, created for His glory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus for good works.

declarations.text: I am part of the body of Christ, united with other believers.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now you are the body of Christ, and each one of you is a part of it.

declarations.text: I am justified by faith and at peace with God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore, since we have been justified through faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: I am chosen, called, and loved by God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But we ought always to thank God for you, brothers and sisters loved by the Lord, because God chose you as firstfruits to be saved.

declarations.text: You made them only a little lower than God and crowned them with glory and honor.
You gave them charge of everything you made, putting all things under their authority.
I know the LORD is always with me. I will not be shaken, for he is right beside me.
The LORD is my rock, my fortress, and my savior; my God is my rock, in who I find protection.
He is my shield, the power that saves me, and my place of safety.
God’s way is perfect. All the LORD’s promises prove true. He is a shield for all who look to him for protection.
May he grant your heart’s desires and make all your plans succeed.
He guides me along right paths, bringing honor to his name.
Even when I walk through the darkest valley, I will not be afraid, for you are close beside me.
I am deeply loved by God with an everlasting love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have loved you with an everlasting love; I have drawn you with unfailing kindness.

declarations.text: Nothing can separate me from God’s love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I am convinced that neither death nor life, neither angels nor demons, neither the present nor the future, nor any powers... will be able to separate us from the love of God.

declarations.text: God’s love for me is greater than I can comprehend.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And may you have the power to understand, as all God’s people should, how wide, how long, how high, and how deep his love is.

declarations.text: I am chosen and dearly loved by God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore, as God’s chosen people, holy and dearly loved, clothe yourselves with compassion, kindness, humility, gentleness, and patience.

declarations.text: God’s love for me never fails.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give thanks to the Lord, for he is good. His love endures forever.

declarations.text: God proved His love for me through Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But God demonstrates his own love for us in this: While we were still sinners, Christ died for us.

declarations.text: I am a child of God, loved beyond measure.
declarations.bibleVerseText: See what great love the Father has lavished on us, that we should be called children of God!

declarations.text: God rejoices over me with singing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord your God is with you, the Mighty Warrior who saves. He will take great delight in you; in his love he will no longer rebuke you, but will rejoice over you with singing.

declarations.text: God’s love surrounds me every day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But you, Lord, are a compassionate and gracious God, slow to anger, abounding in love and faithfulness.

declarations.text: The Lord delights in me because of His great love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lord takes delight in his people; he crowns the humble with victory.

declarations.text: I am rooted and established in God’s love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: That Christ may dwell in your hearts through faith—that you, being rooted and grounded in love.

declarations.text: God’s love for me is unshakable and everlasting.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Though the mountains be shaken and the hills be removed, yet my unfailing love for you will not be shaken.

declarations.text: I am precious in God’s sight and deeply valued.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Because you are precious in my eyes, and honored, and I love you.

declarations.text: I have been redeemed because of God’s great love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In him we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, in accordance with the riches of God’s grace.

declarations.text: God’s love covers all my sins.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Above all, love each other deeply, because love covers over a multitude of sins.

declarations.text: I love because God first loved me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: We love because he first loved us.

declarations.text: God’s love fills my heart through the Holy Spirit.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And hope does not put us to shame, because God’s love has been poured out into our hearts through the Holy Spirit.

declarations.text: The Lord is gracious and compassionate towards me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is gracious and compassionate, slow to anger and rich in love.

declarations.text: God’s love is my refuge and strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But I will sing of your strength, in the morning I will sing of your love; for you are my fortress, my refuge in times of trouble.

declarations.text: God’s love gives me confidence and casts out all fear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear.

declarations.text: I am treasured and dearly loved by God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For you are a people holy to the Lord your God. The Lord your God has chosen you out of all the peoples on the face of the earth to be his people, his treasured possession.

declarations.text: God’s love for me is greater than the heavens.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For great is your love, higher than the heavens; your faithfulness reaches to the skies.

declarations.text: I am surrounded by God’s unfailing love every day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely your goodness and love will follow me all the days of my life.

declarations.text: The Lord’s love for me is never-ending and faithful.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lord is good and his love endures forever; his faithfulness continues through all generations.

declarations.text: Surely your goodness and unfailing love will pursue me all the days of my life, and I will live in the house of the LORD forever
Show me the right path, O LORD; point out the road for me to follow.
The LORD is good and does what is right; he shows the proper path to those who go astray.
Protect me! Rescue my life from them! Do not let me be disgraced, for in you I take refuge.
The LORD is my light and my salvation—so why should I be afraid?
The LORD is my fortress, protecting me from danger,so why should I tremble?
Even if my father and mother abandon me, the LORD will hold me close.
Teach me how to live, O LORD. Lead me along the right path, for my enemies are waiting for me.
Wait patiently for the LORD. Be brave and courageous. Yes, wait patiently for the LORD.
The LORD is my strength and shield. I trust him with all my heart.
The LORD reigns as king forever.
I will exalt you, LORD, for you rescued me. You refused to let my enemies triumph over me.
The LORD gives his people strength. The LORD blesses them with peace.
Weeping may last through the night, but joy comes with the morning.
Let your unfailing love surround us, LORD, for our hope is in you alone.
In my desperation I prayed, and the LORD listened; he saved me from all my troubles.
Even strong young lions sometimes go hungry, but those who trust in the LORD will lack no good thing.
The righteous person faces many troubles, but the LORD comes to the rescue each time.
I have eternal life through Jesus Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

declarations.text: I am a citizen of heaven, and my home is with the Lord.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But our citizenship is in heaven. And we eagerly await a Savior from there, the Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: Jesus has prepared a place for me in heaven.
declarations.bibleVerseText: My Father’s house has many rooms; if that were not so, would I have told you that I am going there to prepare a place for you?

declarations.text: I will dwell with God, and He will wipe away every tear from my eyes.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain.

declarations.text: I have an inheritance in heaven that will never fade away.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And into an inheritance that can never perish, spoil or fade. This inheritance is kept in heaven for you.

declarations.text: My name is written in the Lamb’s Book of Life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Anyone whose name was not found written in the book of life was thrown into the lake of fire.

declarations.text: I will reign with Christ in eternity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If we endure, we will also reign with him.

declarations.text: I am seated with Christ in heavenly places.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God raised us up with Christ and seated us with him in the heavenly realms in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: My reward is in heaven, and I live for eternal treasures.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Rejoice and be glad, because great is your reward in heaven.

declarations.text: I will see God face to face and dwell in His glory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: They will see his face, and his name will be on their foreheads.

declarations.text: I will join the angels and the saints in worshiping God forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: After this I looked, and there before me was a great multitude that no one could count, from every nation, tribe, people and language, standing before the throne and before the Lamb.

declarations.text: I will receive a crown of life that never fades.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed is the one who perseveres under trial because, having stood the test, that person will receive the crown of life.

declarations.text: I will be transformed into the glorious image of Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But we know that when Christ appears, we shall be like him, for we shall see him as he is.

declarations.text: I will live forever in perfect peace and joy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will fill me with joy in your presence, with eternal pleasures at your right hand.

declarations.text: I will walk in the streets of gold in the New Jerusalem.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The great street of the city was of gold, as pure as transparent glass.

declarations.text: I will drink from the water of life, freely given by Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let the one who is thirsty come; and let the one who wishes take the free gift of the water of life.

declarations.text: I will be clothed in white, pure and holy before God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: They have washed their robes and made them white in the blood of the Lamb.

declarations.text: My treasure is stored in heaven, where it can never be stolen.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But store up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where moths and vermin do not destroy, and where thieves do not break in and steal.

declarations.text: I will shine like the stars in God’s kingdom forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the righteous will shine like the sun in the kingdom of their Father.

declarations.text: I will celebrate at the wedding supper of the Lamb.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed are those who are invited to the wedding supper of the Lamb!

declarations.text: I will dwell in the house of the Lord forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And I will dwell in the house of the Lord forever.

declarations.text: I have eternal security in Christ, and no one can snatch me from His hand.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I give them eternal life, and they shall never perish; no one will snatch them out of my hand.

declarations.text: I will inherit the kingdom prepared for me since the creation of the world.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the King will say to those on his right, ‘Come, you who are blessed by my Father; take your inheritance, the kingdom prepared for you since the creation of the world.’

declarations.text: I am saved by grace and have a glorious future in heaven.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For it is by grace you have been saved, through faith—and this is not from yourselves, it is the gift of God.

declarations.text: In my Father's house are many rooms.
They will be his people, and God himself will be with them.
Set your minds on things above, not on earthly things.
Our citizenship is in heaven.
There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain.
I go to prepare a place for you.
The kingdom of heaven has come near.
He will wipe every tear from their eyes.
Store up for yourselves treasures in heaven.
The righteous will shine like the sun in the kingdom of their Father.
My kingdom is not of this world.
No eye has seen, no ear has heard what God has prepared for those who love Him.
To be absent from the body is to be present with the Lord.
The dwelling place of God is with mankind.
But we are looking forward to the new heavens and a new earth.
There before me was a door standing open in heaven.
In keeping with his promise we are looking forward to a new heaven.
Your reward in heaven is great.
This world is not our permanent home, we are looking forward to a home yet to come.
And so we will be with the Lord forever.
Blessed are those who are persecuted because of righteousness, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
The kingdom of God is within you.
Father, I want those you have given me to be with me where I am.
No more night! They will need no light from lamp or sun, for the Lord God will be their light, and they will reign forever and ever.
And death shall be no more, neither shall there be mourning, nor crying, nor pain anymore, for the former things have passed away.
Therefore we do not lose heart. Though outwardly we are wasting away, yet inwardly we are being renewed day by day.
I am eternally secure, for my place in heaven is guaranteed by faith
I face challenges with courage, knowing they are temporary compared to eternal joy
I am filled with hope, for my future home is overflowing with God's love
I cannot be defeated, for my ultimate victory lies in reaching heaven
I embrace setbacks as opportunities for growth, knowing they refine me for heaven
I am a champion in God's eyes, destined to dwell in His eternal kingdom
Every good deed is a treasure stored in heaven, building my inheritance
I walk through life with confidence, knowing my citizenship is in heaven
Difficulties cannot diminish my joy, for my true reward awaits in heaven
I persevere through trials, for my temporary suffering produces eternal glory
I embrace challenges as stepping stones, leading me closer to my heavenly home
I radiate hope, for my future shines bright with the promise of heaven
I overcome fear, for my eternal destination is one of perfect love
I live with purpose, for my journey on earth prepares me for the wonders of heaven
I find strength in knowing my struggles have meaning, shaping me for a glorious eternity
I face the unknown with faith, for my eternal home is a place of unimaginable beauty
I choose love over negativity, for heaven is built on the foundation of God's love
I release worry, for my future is secure in the promise of heaven.
I celebrate life's victories, big and small, for each one brings me closer to my heavenly reward.
I am unshakable, knowing my final destination is with God in heaven.
I am destined for greatness because heaven awaits me.
I am living with eternal perspective, focused on my heavenly home.
I am victorious in every challenge because heaven is my reward.
I am at peace, for my name is written in the book of life in heaven.
I am living joyfully, knowing heaven's joy awaits me.
I am transcending earthly troubles with my focus on heaven.
I am comforted in sorrow, for heaven promises no more tears.
I am living with courage, knowing my future is secure in heaven.
I am inspired to love, for love is the language of heaven.
I am beyond defeat, heaven's gates are open for me.
I am living in freedom, knowing that heaven is my eternal home.
I am embracing each day with the joy of heaven in my heart.
I am a reflection of heaven's light in this world.
I am secure in God's love, with heaven as my ultimate destination.
I am living in victory, with the promise of heaven before me.
Trust in the LORD and do good. Then you will live safely in the land and prosper.
Take delight in the LORD, and he will give you your heart’s desires.
Commit everything you do to the LORD. Trust him, and he will help you.
The LORD directs the steps of the godly. He delights in every detail of their lives.
I am walking boldly in God’s purpose for my life.
I have divine guidance directing me toward my destiny.
I am equipped with strength to fulfill my calling.
I have God’s wisdom lighting the path to my future.
I am thriving in the purpose God has designed for me.
I am chosen and called to fulfill God’s plan for my life.
I have peace knowing my destiny is secure in God’s hands.
I am walking by faith into the destiny God has prepared for me.
I have the courage to pursue God’s purpose for my life.
I am filled with confidence in God’s perfect plan for my future.
I am aligning my steps with God’s divine purpose for me.
I have faith that God is opening doors to my destiny.
I am strong in the Lord, fulfilling my divine assignment.
I have unshakable hope in God’s promises for my future.
I am stepping into my destiny with joy and faith.
I have clarity and direction through God’s Spirit within me.
I am fulfilling my destiny with grace and determination.
I have favor and abundance as I pursue God’s purpose.
I am fully equipped to walk in God’s calling for my life.
I have faith that God’s timing is perfect for my destiny.
I am rooted in God’s truth, fulfilling my divine purpose.
I have strength to overcome every obstacle on the way to my destiny.
I am living a life of purpose, guided by God’s promises.
I have God’s blessings pouring over my journey toward my calling.
I am moving forward in faith, fulfilling every part of my destiny.
I am committed to taking bold steps toward my God-given dreams.
I am making intentional choices that align with God's purpose for my life.
I am willing to make sacrifices to see God's vision for me fulfilled.
I am trusting God’s timing as I take each step toward my destiny.
I am embracing change and growth as I pursue my God-given dreams.
I am stepping into my calling with courage and determination.
I am obedient to God’s direction as I walk toward my future.
I am choosing to walk by faith and not by sight in pursuit of my dreams.
I am confident in the path God has set before me.
I am laying aside distractions to focus on fulfilling my purpose.
I am willing to sacrifice temporary comfort for eternal rewards.
I am determined to stay focused on God's promises for my life.
I am consistently making decisions that align with my God-given dreams.
I am trusting God’s strength to carry me through every challenge.
I am setting boundaries that protect my purpose and dreams.
I am choosing to walk in obedience to God's will, even when it's hard.
I am letting go of fear and stepping into the boldness of my calling.
I am committed to seeing my God-given dreams come to fruition.
I am taking small steps of faith that lead to great purpose.
I am aligning my actions with the vision God has given me for my life.
I am saved by God’s grace, not my works.
I choose to rely on God’s grace daily.
I have unlimited access to God’s grace.
I trust in God’s grace to sustain me.
I attract favor through God’s abundant grace.
I am covered by grace in every situation.
I thrive because His grace empowers me.
I walk in freedom through God’s grace.
I receive grace upon grace every day.
I have peace knowing grace covers my past.
I choose grace over fear and doubt.
I am strengthened by the grace of Jesus.
I trust in God’s grace to guide my steps.
I am transformed by the power of grace.
I live with confidence knowing grace sustains me.
I embrace grace and walk in boldness.
I am growing in grace and wisdom daily.
I have grace to overcome every obstacle.
I choose to extend grace as I receive it.
I am blessed because grace surrounds me.
I walk by faith, covered in grace.
I attract blessings through God’s grace.
I am secure because grace never runs out.
I find rest in God’s amazing grace.
I trust in grace to lead me to victory.
I am saved by God's unmerited kindness.
I choose to rely on divine mercy daily.
I have an endless supply of God's favor.
I trust in God's love to sustain me.
I attract blessings beyond my efforts.
I am covered in God’s divine kindness.
I thrive because His favor strengthens me.
I walk in the kindness that restores me.
I receive blessings beyond what I deserve.
I have peace knowing I am fully accepted.
I choose divine help over fear and doubt.
I am strengthened by God's endless mercy.
I trust in God's goodness to guide me.
I am transformed by His unlimited kindness.
I live with confidence knowing His love sustains me.
I embrace divine kindness and walk in freedom.
I am growing in wisdom and divine favor daily.
I have divine strength to overcome every challenge.
I choose to extend kindness as I receive it.
I am blessed because God's love surrounds me.
I walk by faith, covered in His goodness.
I attract favor and mercy in all I do.
I am secure because His love never runs out.
I find rest in God's unfailing kindness.
I trust in His love to lead me to victory.
I am covered by Jesus’ abundant grace every day.
I have victory in life through the power of Jesus’ grace.
I am forgiven and redeemed by the limitless grace of Jesus.
I have access to God’s blessings through Jesus’ grace.
I am free from shame, embraced by the grace of Jesus.
I have new beginnings each day because of Jesus’ grace.
I have endless hope because Jesus’ grace is alive in me.
I am secure in Jesus’ grace, which will never leave me.
I have strength to face trials because Jesus’ grace carries me.
I am thriving in life, covered by Jesus’ grace and love.
I have confidence because Jesus’ grace has made me whole.
I am at peace knowing Jesus’ grace is sufficient for me.
I have been chosen to live in the freedom of Jesus’ grace.
I am walking in God’s favor because of Jesus’ endless grace.
I am living under God’s grace, no matter the choices I’ve made.
I am forgiven and free through God's unmerited grace.
I am trusting in God’s grace to guide me through every storm.
I am redeemed from my mistakes and covered by God’s grace.
I am receiving God's grace to overcome the consequences of my past choices.
I am confident that God's grace is greater than any storm I face.
I am standing firm in God’s grace, even when life feels difficult.
I am wrapped in God’s grace, and it sustains me through my struggles.
I am walking by grace, not by perfection, in every season of life.
I am grateful for God’s grace that covers me in times of failure.
I am not defined by my past choices, but by God’s grace and mercy.
I am at peace, knowing that God's grace will see me through every trial.
I am strengthened by God’s grace, even when life doesn’t go as planned.
I am learning to rest in God's grace as I move forward from my mistakes.
I am choosing to trust in God's grace, no matter what storms come my way.
I am covered by God's grace, and it empowers me to rise above my failures.
I am not consumed by guilt, but renewed by God’s grace in every situation.
I am living in the freedom of God’s grace, even when I face hardship.
I am relying on God’s grace to bring peace to my heart in difficult times.
I am trusting that God's grace is enough for me, no matter my circumstances.
I walk by faith, not by sight.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For we walk by faith, not by sight.

declarations.text: God has not given me a spirit of fear, but of power, love, and a sound mind.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For God gave us a spirit not of fear but of power and love and self-control.

declarations.text: I believe that all things are possible with God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Jesus looked at them and said, ‘With man this is impossible, but with God all things are possible.’

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord with all my heart and do not lean on my understanding.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and do not lean on your own understanding.

declarations.text: I have faith as small as a mustard seed, and I move mountains.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If you have faith as small as a mustard seed, you can say to this mountain, ‘Move from here to there,’ and it will move.

declarations.text: My faith is my victory over the world.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For everyone who has been born of God overcomes the world. And this is the victory that has overcome the world—our faith.

declarations.text: I live by faith, for the righteous shall live by faith.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But my righteous one shall live by faith, and if he shrinks back, my soul has no pleasure in him.

declarations.text: I fix my eyes on Jesus, the author and finisher of my faith.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Looking to Jesus, the founder and perfecter of our faith.

declarations.text: I am not anxious about anything, but I pray and trust God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

declarations.text: God fights for me, and I remain in faith.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.

declarations.text: I will not fear, for God is with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Fear not, for I am with you; be not dismayed, for I am your God.

declarations.text: I put my faith in God, and He rewards me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And without faith it is impossible to please him, for whoever would draw near to God must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who seek him.

declarations.text: I will not be shaken, for my faith is in the Lord.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I keep my eyes always on the Lord. With him at my right hand, I will not be shaken.

declarations.text: I cast all my cares on God because He cares for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Casting all your anxieties on him, because he cares for you.

declarations.text: I have faith that God will supply all my needs.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And my God will supply every need of yours according to his riches in glory in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I remain strong in faith, giving glory to God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He did not waver through unbelief regarding the promise of God, but was strengthened in his faith and gave glory to God.

declarations.text: I do not waver, for I trust in God's promises.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let us hold fast the confession of our hope without wavering, for he who promised is faithful.

declarations.text: I believe, and I see God’s glory in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Jesus said to her, 'Did I not tell you that if you believe you will see the glory of God?'

declarations.text: I overcome fear with faith in Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not fear, only believe.

declarations.text: I am more than a conqueror through Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: No, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us.

declarations.text: I will not worry about tomorrow, for God is my provider.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself.

declarations.text: I am confident that God will complete His good work in me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He who began a good work in you will bring it to completion at the day of Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: I resist the devil by standing firm in faith.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Resist him, standing firm in the faith.

declarations.text: I fight the good fight of faith and hold on to eternal life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Fight the good fight of the faith. Take hold of the eternal life to which you were called.

declarations.text: Faith is my shield against the enemy's attacks.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In all circumstances take up the shield of faith, with which you can extinguish all the flaming darts of the evil one.

declarations.text: I have unshakable faith that moves every mountain.
I am walking boldly in faith, trusting God’s power within me.
I have faith that nothing is impossible with God.
I am strengthened by faith to overcome every challenge.
I have faith that God is working everything for my good.
I am confident in God’s promises to move mountains for me.
I have faith as small as a mustard seed, and it is powerful.
I am walking by faith, not by sight, trusting God completely.
I have faith that God makes a way where there is no way.
I am fearless because my faith is anchored in Christ.
I have faith that God’s power within me can conquer all things.
I am holding onto faith, knowing God’s timing is perfect.
I have faith that every mountain will move in Jesus’ name.
I am filled with faith, knowing God is faithful to His Word.
I have faith that God equips me to overcome every obstacle.
I am declaring victory in faith, for God is my strength.
I have faith that moves mountains and opens doors of blessing.
I am rooted in faith, unshaken by the storms of life.
I have faith that God is bigger than any challenge I face.
I am walking in faith, trusting God’s perfect plan for me.
I have unwavering faith that opens doors no one can shut.
I am moving forward in faith, believing in God’s power to deliver.
I have faith that God’s miracles are working in my life now.
I am speaking to mountains, and they are moving by God’s power.
I have faith that God’s grace is sufficient to carry me through.
I am trusting Jesus to make a way where there seems to be no way.
I am confident that Jesus is guiding me toward the path He has prepared for me.
I am trusting in Jesus' perfect timing to open doors in my life.
I am assured that Jesus is making a way even in the midst of challenges.
I am trusting Jesus to turn every obstacle into an opportunity.
I am relying on Jesus to guide my steps and lead me to my breakthrough.
I am believing that Jesus is already working behind the scenes for my good.
I am trusting Jesus to provide what I need, when I need it.
I am confident that Jesus is making a way even in impossible situations.
I am trusting that Jesus will lead me through every storm to calmer waters.
I am believing that Jesus' way is always the best way for my life.
I am trusting Jesus to provide divine solutions for every challenge I face.
I am confident that with Jesus, all things are possible, and He is making a way for me.
I am trusting in the promises of Jesus to lead me into a future full of hope.
I am believing that Jesus will make a way in the wilderness and rivers in the desert.
I am trusting Jesus to bring clarity and direction to my path.
I am relying on Jesus to open new doors and opportunities for me.
I am trusting that Jesus will provide the wisdom and strength I need to overcome every challenge.
I am confident that Jesus is leading me to a place of peace and abundance.
I am trusting Jesus to guide my decisions and make a way in every area of my life.
I am relying on Jesus to break every chain of addiction in my life.
I am trusting Jesus to set me free from the power of addiction.
I am strong in Jesus, and with His help, I am overcoming every addiction.
I am healed by the power of Jesus to overcome all strongholds of addiction.
I am free in Christ, and I no longer serve the chains of addiction.
I am trusting in Jesus to renew my mind and transform my desires.
I am victorious in Jesus over every addiction that has held me captive.
I am delivered by God’s grace and walk in freedom from addiction.
I am empowered by the Holy Spirit to resist temptation and overcome addiction.
I am filled with peace and strength through Jesus, and I am overcoming addiction.
I am leaning on Jesus' promises to break every cycle of addiction in my life.
I am trusting in Jesus to restore my life and free me from the grip of addiction.
I am receiving God's healing power to overcome the bondage of addiction.
I am choosing to walk in freedom and victory, relying on Jesus to overcome addiction.
I am more than a conqueror in Christ, and addiction has no hold over me.
I am confident because I belong to Jesus, and He empowers me.
I am fearless and bold because I am a child of God.
I am strong in the Lord, and my confidence comes from His love and power.
I am equipped with divine confidence, for I am His masterpiece.
I am secure in who I am, because I am chosen and loved by Jesus.
I am confident in my purpose because God has a plan for me.
I am bold and courageous because I know the Lord is with me.
I am unshaken in my confidence because my identity is rooted in Jesus.
I am confident to face any challenge, for I walk in God’s strength.
I am worthy of great things because I am a child of the Most High God.
I am filled with unshakable confidence because Jesus is my foundation.
I am confident in my abilities because Christ strengthens me in all things.
I am confident and capable, because God is for me and with me.
I am equipped with divine confidence because I belong to Jesus, the King of kings.
I am bold in my faith, for I know my confidence comes from the Lord.
I am strong and courageous because the Lord is with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Have I not commanded you? Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.

declarations.text: I will not fear, for God is my strength and my salvation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my light and my salvation—whom shall I fear? The Lord is the stronghold of my life—of whom shall I be afraid?

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord and will not be shaken.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When I am afraid, I put my trust in you.

declarations.text: I have peace because Jesus has overcome the world.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world.

declarations.text: I will not be anxious, for God takes care of me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

declarations.text: I cast all my fears on God because He cares for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.

declarations.text: I will not be moved because God is my refuge.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble. Therefore we will not fear.

declarations.text: I will not fear bad news because my heart is steadfast in the Lord.
declarations.bibleVerseText: They will have no fear of bad news; their hearts are steadfast, trusting in the Lord.

declarations.text: I am more than a conqueror through Christ’s love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: No, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us.

declarations.text: I do not fear because God goes before me and strengthens me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you.

declarations.text: I have the spirit of power, love, and self-control.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For God gave us a spirit not of fear but of power and love and self-control.

declarations.text: I will fear no evil because God is with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me.

declarations.text: I am safe in the shadow of God’s wings.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge.

declarations.text: I will not worry about tomorrow, for God holds my future.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself.

declarations.text: God’s perfect love drives out all fear in me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear, because fear has to do with punishment.

declarations.text: I take courage because the Lord fights for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.

declarations.text: I fear nothing because the Lord is my helper.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So we can confidently say, 'The Lord is my helper; I will not fear; what can man do to me?'

declarations.text: I am not afraid because the Lord delivers me from trouble.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I sought the Lord, and he answered me; he delivered me from all my fears.

declarations.text: I stand firm, for the Lord is my shield.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But you, Lord, are a shield around me, my glory, the One who lifts my head high.

declarations.text: I am bold and fearless because the righteous are as bold as a lion.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The wicked flee when no one pursues, but the righteous are bold as a lion.

declarations.text: I have peace because my mind is stayed on God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You keep him in perfect peace whose mind is stayed on you, because he trusts in you.

declarations.text: I do not fear because I trust in God’s unfailing love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But I trust in your unfailing love; my heart rejoices in your salvation.

declarations.text: I am not afraid of anything, for God is my confidence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lord will be your confidence and will keep your foot from being caught.

declarations.text: I take courage because God’s promises never fail.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Not one of all the Lord’s good promises to Israel failed; every one was fulfilled.

declarations.text: I am courageous because I belong to Jesus, and He strengthens me.
I am fearless because the Lord is with me, and I trust in His power.
I am bold and brave, for I know that Jesus walks with me every step.
I am empowered by the Holy Spirit, and I rise above fear with courage.
I am confident and courageous because God has given me a spirit of power.
I am strong in the Lord, and His courage fills my heart and mind.
I am brave enough to face every challenge, because I trust in Jesus’ plan for me.
I am fearless in the face of adversity, for God’s perfect love casts out all fear.
I am courageous in every situation, for I rely on Jesus to guide me.
I am filled with boldness and strength, knowing that the Lord is my refuge.
I am not afraid, for the Lord is my light and my salvation, and He gives me courage.
I am fearless in my faith, for Jesus has overcome the world and gives me courage.
I am walking in divine courage because I am a child of God, and His power is in me.
I am unshaken by fear, for the presence of Jesus empowers me with courage.
I am courageous in the face of fear, knowing that Jesus has already conquered it for me.
I am releasing all grudges and choosing to forgive, just as Jesus forgave me.
I am free from bitterness, for I choose forgiveness and peace in my heart.
I am forgiving others as Christ has forgiven me, letting go of all hurt.
I am choosing love over pain and forgiveness over bitterness.
I am releasing the past, for I know that God has called me to walk in freedom.
I am healed and made whole by God's grace, letting go of all offenses.
I am filled with peace, as I choose to forgive and walk in freedom from resentment.
I am choosing to let go of pain and forgive, trusting God to heal my heart.
I am free from the weight of unforgiveness, for I trust God's justice and mercy.
I am walking in the freedom of forgiveness, releasing all grudges and hurt.
I am empowered by God's love to forgive those who have wronged me, letting go of all anger.
I am choosing peace by forgiving others and surrendering my pain to God.
I am letting go of resentment and embracing forgiveness, knowing that it sets me free.
I am forgiving freely, as God has freely forgiven me, and releasing all hurt.
I am walking in the grace of forgiveness, knowing it brings healing and freedom.
I am safe and secure in God’s protection, no matter what life brings.
I am trusting in God’s protection, for He is my refuge in times of trouble.
I am confident that God’s protection surrounds me, even when life feels chaotic.
I am held in God’s mighty hands, and His protection never fails me.
I am trusting God to shield me from harm and guide me through every storm.
I am at peace knowing that God’s protection is greater than any fear or uncertainty.
I am covered by the blood of Jesus, and I trust in His constant protection.
I am surrounded by God’s angels, and His protection is my shield in all circumstances.
I am unshaken by life’s challenges because I trust in God’s steadfast protection.
I am confident that no weapon formed against me shall prosper, for God is my protector.
I am safe under the shadow of the Almighty, no matter how crazy life gets.
I am trusting in God’s protection to guide me through every unexpected situation.
I am resting in the assurance that God’s protection is my constant companion.
I am surrounded by God’s peace, knowing His protection covers me through every storm.
I am trusting that God is my strong tower, and I will not fear, no matter what comes my way.
I am grateful for God's presence, even in the midst of difficult circumstances.
I am choosing gratitude every day, knowing that God is working all things for my good.
I am thankful for God's peace that guards my heart, even when life is hard.
I am grateful for the lessons in every trial, knowing God is refining me.
I am thankful for God's faithfulness, which remains constant, no matter the storms I face.
I am grateful for the strength God provides to endure difficult times with a thankful heart.
I am thankful for every blessing, even in seasons of challenge, for God is with me.
I am grateful for the opportunity to grow through hardship, trusting in God's plan for me.
I am thankful for God's provision, knowing that He is my constant source of hope and strength.
I am choosing gratitude over fear, trusting that God is in control of every situation.
I am grateful for God's grace, which lifts me up even when life feels overwhelming.
I am thankful for the peace of God that surpasses understanding, even in difficult times.
I am grateful for the strength to face each day, knowing God is with me through it all.
I am thankful for every moment, choosing to see God’s hand in both the good and the bad.
I am grateful for God’s promises, which give me hope and gratitude, even when life is tough.
I am being led by God’s perfect guidance every step of the way.
I am trusting in God’s direction, knowing He will lead me to the right path.
I am following God’s voice, confident that He will lead me through every decision.
I am surrendering to God’s guidance, trusting His plan is greater than my own.
I am filled with peace as I walk in God’s guidance, knowing He is directing my steps.
I am open to hearing God’s voice and following His direction every day.
I am trusting that God is leading me in the right direction for my life and purpose.
I am confident that God is leading me through every challenge and toward my breakthrough.
I am walking by faith, following the path God has set before me with trust and obedience.
I am listening to God’s direction and choosing to follow His leading with courage.
I am guided by God’s wisdom, which helps me make the right decisions every day.
I am trusting God to guide me in every area of my life, knowing His plans are perfect.
I am following God’s leading with confidence, knowing He is always with me.
I am being led by the Holy Spirit, walking in peace as I follow God’s plan for my life.
I am trusting God to lead me through every decision, knowing He has a purpose for me.
I am healed by the stripes of Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: By his wounds we are healed.
